title.narrative: Somalia Emergency Drought Response and Recovery Project

description.narrative: The Project Development Objective is to address the immediate needs of the drought affected people within the territory of the Federal Republic of Somalia, and support resilient recovery through the provision of livelihood opportunities and the restoration of agricultural and pastoral production.

participating-org.narrative: Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations (Grantee)
Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations - Somalia (Supported Agency)
International Committee of the Red Cross (ICRC) - Somalia Delegation (Supported Agency)
International Committee of the Red Cross (ICRC) HQ (Grantee)

condition.narrative: Within 30 days from effectiveness date, FAO shall prepare, in accordance with terms of reference acceptable to the Association, anEnvironmental and Social Management Framework (“ESMF”), including a Pest Management Plan (“PMP”); and adopt such ESMF as shall havebeen approved by the Association and publish the ESMF in a manner acceptable to the Association.
